column1: Uchi////Pros: The flavors. The menu constantly is rotated (both because of seasonal ingredients and new combinations that the chefs think up of)
column2: and so each visit is different! You get what you order
column3: and dont expect to love the taste of everything. Again
column4: the strength of Uchi is in the combination of flavors: some combinations work for some people
column5: and others for other people. Eat the dish how it was intended to be eaten; eat all the flavors (dont pick and choose the ingredients you like) and appreciate what each one contributes.
